definition: mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
Mandarin Phonetic Symbols 1 (official name of the phonetic system of writing Chinese used in Taiwan)/Bopomofo/abbr. to 注音一式[zhu4 yin1 yi1 shi4]
pinyin: Guo2 yu3 zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4 di4 yi1 shi4

definition: unsigned (i.e. the absolute value, regardless of plus or minus sign)
unsigned remainder (i.e. the remainder after rounding to the nearest integer)
pinyin: yu2 liu2 wu2 fu2 hao4 shu4

sentences.english: A cultural icon, he is widely known by the single name Elvis.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个文化符号，他的名字埃尔维斯也广为人知。

sentences.english: It's fickle and full of angle brackets.
sentences.chinese: 它多变，而且还会充满标记符号。

sentences.english: A substitution matrix lets you assign match scores individually to each pair of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 使用置换矩阵能够根据每对符号单独分配匹配得分。

sentences.english: You can also set permissions using octal numbers instead of symbols.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以使用八进制取代符号设置权限。

sentences.english: Chapter II is the foregrounding of the language symbols.
sentences.chinese: 第二章语言符号前景化。

sentences.english: That sign means that the road is blocked.
sentences.chinese: 这个符号暗示此路不通。

sentences.english: Appearance of the first written symbols.
sentences.chinese: 原始文字符号开始出现。

sentences.english: There's an acute accent on thee in 'blé' which is the French word for corn.
sentences.chinese: 在法语中是玉米的意思，它上面有个强调符号。

sentences.english: He used it in dating his letter, then once again in the text.
sentences.chinese: 他在信中用这个符号注明日期，然后再次用在文本中。

sentences.english: Sampling space is split directly instead of using the mask of the refinable function.
sentences.chinese: 采样空间被直接分解来取代对加细函数的符号分解。

sentences.english: Sign value is the central concept of Baudrillard's sign culture theory.
sentences.chinese: 符号价值是鲍德里亚符号文化理论的中心。

sentences.english: Sign value is the central concept of Baudrillard's sign culture theory.
sentences.chinese: 符号价值是鲍德里亚符号文化理论的中心。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is on establishing a contemporary Chinese cultural symbol system.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是创造中华民族的当代艺术符号语言。

sentences.english: Punctuation marks are an integrant sign of cohesion and coherence in modern writing.
sentences.chinese: 标点符号是现代书面语中不可缺少的衔接和连贯标志。

sentences.english: A line integral of the second type changes sign when the direction of the integration path is reversed.
sentences.chinese: 当积分路径改变方向时，第二类曲线积分改变符号。

sentences.english: An asterism is a star formation that is not an officially recognized constellation.
sentences.chinese: 这个三星符号是没有被官方确认的星座。

definition: Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
to brand (cattle etc)/brand/(fig.) to leave a lasting mark/to stigmatize/mark/stamp/stigma
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
